newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia housing backs economic pickup-govt.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia housing backs economic pickup-govt.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said on Wednesday the improving housing sector was in line with the government's view of a strengthening economy in 1997.
"The turning up in relation to the housing industry is consistent with a strengthening economy through 1997," Costello told parliament.
